Generation V.Black: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
Generation V.White: Its auditory sense is astounding. It has a radarlike ability to understand its surroundings through slight sounds.
Generation V.Black 2: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
Generation V.White 2: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.

Generation VI.X: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
Generation VI.Y: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

Generation VIII.Sword: Audino's sense of hearing is superb. Not even a pebble rolling along over a mile away will escape Audino's ears.
Generation VIII.Shield: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures' feelings and physical conditions.
